text: Ammayude Swantham Kunju Mary is a 1990 Indian Malayalam film directed by Vinayan and starring Nedumudi Venu and Devan in the lead role. ==Cast== *Nedumudi Venu *Devan * Vijayan * Harish Kumar * Ravi Menon * Shari * Sudheer * Saj V Vijayan (Cousin of Arun V Pushpan) ==References== ==External links== * Category:1990 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Ammayude Swantham Kunju Mary
